changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE FILMS( id serial PRIMARY KEY, name varchar(200) NOT NULL, rating_IMDB float NOT NULL, tag_line varchar(50) NOT NULL, release_date timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, country_id integer NOT NULL, age_Limit varchar(200), duration_in_minutes integer NOT NULL, description varchar(1000), date_of_creation timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, date_of_change timestamp WITH time ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_DATE, CONSTRAINT ct_film UNIQUE(name, description), CONSTRAINT fk_country FOREIGN KEY (country_id) REFERENCES COUNTRIES(id) );
